author: AdrianoDee
body:
This PR updates the wfs used in PR testing, IB test (standard and GPU).  It includes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/f77b3b3bd417e0ce73302d519b8ca1dfb8aa5078 from @mmusich. 

For the moment the 2023 wfs are kept as they are with the idea of reducing them later this year.

The default input GEN-SIM datasets for 2024 conditions are updated to `14_0_0_pre3` RelVals.

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44075
title: [14_0_X] Updates for 2024 Wfs (PR Testing, IBs, Patatrack, inputs)
